title: i thought people with similar mmr were made as a team during ranked solo queue?
body:
Just like the title, arent people with similar mmr matched into a team for ranked solo?

I dont normally get angry at toxic players but there are so many players who just ruin the game for everyone else.

WTF is with the team match up????

replies.body: ok I'm convinced you don't know what the word toxic means.
What does a players MMR and their toxicity have to do with each other?
yes, but what does that have to do with people being toxic

you know how you solo queue for a ranked game?

people with similar mmr gets made into a team with you?

but yet they seem to play toxic as if they werent similar mmr with you?

yes.
don't know what mmr has to do with being toxic, there are toxic players everywhere in every game.
dont people with higher mmr tend to play better? if not my knowledge is wrong
